problem_text: Triangles F G H and F H J are inscribed in \odot K with \widehat F G \cong \widehat F I. Find x if m \angle 1 = 6 x - 5, and m \angle 2 = 7 x + 4.
compact_text: Triangles FGH and FHJ are inscribed in \odot K with \widehat FG \cong \widehat FI. Find x if m \angle 1 = 6x-5, and m \angle 2 = 7x+4.
annotat_text: Triangles $F G H$ and $F H J$ are inscribed in $\odot K$ with $\widehat{F G} \cong \widehat{F I} .$ Find $x$ if $m \angle 1=6 x-5,$ and $m \angle 2=7 x+4$
